DOC.brief_summary: Acne Keloidalis Nuchae ( AKN ) long stand hair follicle disease bump scar skin back head neck . The purpose new study determine well hair removal laser ( NdYag Laser ) work treat AKN .
DOC.criteria: For inclusion , subject must : 1 . Be least 18 year old 2 . Be otherwise healthy 3 . Have diagnosis AKN least 10 papules/pustules and/or nonkeloidal plaque > 7 cm2 area . Subject must : 1 . Have AKN keloidal plaque > 3 cm length 2 . Be use medication undergoing procedure treatment AKN 3 . Have use topical medication undergone procedure treatment AKN within two week study enrollment 4 . Have use oral medication AKN within 4 week study enrollment : 5 . Have serious , uncontrolled medical condition 6 . Be pregnant time study .
